title: LV-KC MNF Recap + Gregg's Top 6 Tight Ends in the NFL (with Steve Palazzolo)
itunes:title: LV-KC MNF Recap + Gregg's Top 6 Tight Ends in the NFL (with Steve Palazzolo)
description:
Gregg Rosenthal is joined by Steve Palazzolo of Pro Football Focus to recap the Chiefs-Raiders Monday Night Football thriller. Gregg and Steve discuss the biggest plays in the game, some controversial penalties, and the aggressive decisions by both coaching staffs. Then, Gregg closes the show with his top six NFL tight ends as of this weekend.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
